FullDescription: KONUX is a German AI scale-up, transforming railway operations for a sustainable future. LiveEO's innovative approach is redefining industry practices, improving operational efficiency, and safeguarding infrastructure safety and sustainability, setting new standards in asset management.

FullDescription: We are delivering data analytics to rail operators to help them prevent speed reductions as the global climate are getting warmer every year. We are collecting data from rails and by enriching the data we are building a unique dataset that we use to predict highest possible temperature each day based on 67 different data points. It’s pure machine learning or AI used to prevent derailments which cost the rail operators between $1 and $30 billion each year.

Besides software the company also develops its own NextGen radar systems and sensors.

Internet of Things, iOS, Machine Learning, Mobile, Mobile Apps, Software
FullDescription: Based on machine learning algorithm - the app gathers crowdsourcing world events data to feed into machine learning models. Multiple models are created for each vertical – Stocks, Politics, Weather etc How it works? Chrono is designed to harness common user experience and knowledge. Users can: -	Create an event -	Join connecting events -	Copy events and paths created by others -	Users can vote on each connection and the app will maintain the path that gets the highest votes. It is a very democratic process.  -	View statistics in profile What is an event? Event in Chrono app is a world incident that ever happened in the past or currently happening or going to happen in future. Below are few examples: •	Random events – Traffic in highway 101 / Strange smell in Fremont, CA / Construction going on at railway line near Chicago •	Political – Debt crisis in Greece / End of Iraq War / GOP presidential race •	Financial – Google stock price goes up by 1% / Dollar value increases / Oil price goes down in United States / Coffee price increases •	Natural Phenomenon – Earthquake in Alaska / Tsunami in Japan in 2011 / Hurricane Katrina / Drought in California •	Social – Arab spring / protest against government in Hong Kong •	Astronomical event – star alignment on Monday / Full moon day / Solar eclipse •	Company events – Larry Ellison steps down as Oracle CEO/ Apple launches iPhone 6 / Microsoft releases Windows 8

FullDescription: Our solution - based on computer vision and artificial intellegence, detect defects, anomalies, read and recognize complex visual information.  Using machine learnning algorithms in conjunction with computer vision components, AURORAi solution provides: - Railway transport: reading graphic information on the car; monitoring the condition of the wheel pair - detection of cracks and wedge; shaped detects in blocks. - MINING: calculation and determination of ore material in the core; determination of core fracture; core integrity control. - ENERGY:condition monitoring of power boilers; control of production personnel in high-risk areas - STEEL: visual inspection of connections; control of the technical condition of objects; monitoring of production pensonel.  - INDUSRTY: control of welded seams; release of finished products;  control of geometric parameters of manufactured products; detection of defects on the surface of manufactured products.
